headline: Looking For Yields: Evergy, Sempra, And Philip Morris Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Evergy, Sempra, and Philip Morris have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of over 3%.
